title: Three Roles a Spouse Should Play
itunes:author: Guest: Kevin Thompson
itunes:summary:
Many couples will tell you that a strong friendship is one of the best aspects of marriage. But if couples are not careful, it can be easy to get caught in the business of everyday life. John, Greg and Erin talk about how they encourage couples to keep their friendship strong, even when times get busy. Featuring Pastor Kevin Thompson.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Friends, Partners and Lover" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-06-30?refcd=1443001

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/three-roles-a-spouse-should-play/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/embracing-your-role-as-a-spouse-digital/?refcd=1443001

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
